title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 98-1.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 98-1.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Subpart shall be applicable to all persons who propose to establish and/or operate a health maintenance organization (HMO), special purpose health maintenance organization, also known as a prepaid health services plan (PHSP), comprehensive HIV special needs plan (HIV SNP) or, as specified, a primary care partial capitation provider (PCPCP) or managed long term care plan (MLTCP) or who currently operate an HMO, PHSP, HIV SNP or, as specified, a PCPCP or MLTCP certified under article 44 of the Public Health Law within the State of New York, which may hereinafter be referred to individually or collectively as managed care organization (MCOs). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
98-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
